Time passes and Julie go upstairs to verify if her older sister was sleeping. Hearing some snoring, she takes it as a green light and walks in. "I can't believe we wore these things." She opens Amelia's dresser and takes out all of her clothes.

"Ugh, gross." She drops them on the floor of the living room. "Now I need to take mine." She comes back with a few pieces of clothing since she didn't pack many. She takes out garbage bags and puts all clothes inside of them. "I guess this time is Goodbye Kitty." Julie throws a pair of panties.

The blonde teenager drags the bags outside of the house and hopes that the garbage truck would be early to get rid of all of their clothes. "Now it's time to sleep." Julie goes to her bed and waits for a great day tomorrow.

The next morning...

"Hello?"

Amelia then remembers her, Julie brought her once to her apartment for a practice and decided to keep her number for emergencies, she seemed like a nice girl. Hearing her out, Amelia's mind came up with an idea. "Sure, where are you going to meet her?" She listens to Natalie. "Okay. Perfect, I'll drop her around that time." She nods. "Alright class," she said, grabbing a marker and writing her name on the board, "My name is Ms. Thatch, and I'll be your math teacher this year." She turned back to the students, "Any questions before we begin?"

There were none.

Amelia smiled, "Then let's begin!" And she had the class open up their textbooks and start their work, everything was going smoothly, her lesson went off without a hitch, the classwork was where she had to walk around and help out the students. Thankfully James had given her advice, and instead of bending over the student's desks or shoulders to help them, she squatted down, this way her behind wasn't sticking in a student's face, or her breasts at eye level.

First period ended well, and Amelia sighed, "I can do this!" She cheered to herself, maybe this wasn't going to be so bad?

As she steps in, she is greeted by the students, however, she notices the voices sounded younger, she turns around to face them and realizes she was in a 4th grade class.

"Oh, I'm sorry. I must have made a mistake." She walks away, giggles and laughs from the kids caused her to blush. She goes to the hallway and checks her schedule, turns out that was her next group. She was bothered by this and decided to talk with the principal.

"Hi, Amelia." Mr. Peters was leaving his office. "What can I do for you?"

"Hi, I want to ask why am I in an elementary class?"

"Really? Let me see that." He reads the schedule. "There must be a mix up between teachers. I'll check it later."

"And what should I do?"

"I'm sorry, Amelia. But I'm afraid that you'll have to teach those kids until I found out what happened." He replies.

Amelia was annoyed, but she thanked him and walked back to the classroom.

"So, you weren't lost?" A kid asks, causing more laughter towards her.

"Apparently not." She says. "Now keep quiet." She writes her name on the board. "My name is Mrs. Thatch and I'll be your temporary math teacher." She says. "Any questions?"

The kids didn't reply, so she thought that maybe she was having this group under control, however....

As she went through the math lesson, she heard some whispers and giggling as she wrote on the board or whenever she was helpin a student. She could only take so much before she sighed and asked the class, "Alright, what's with all the giggling?" She put her hand on her hips, "Come on! Tell me."

A blonde boy in the back, Nathan, according to the name card on his desk, raised his hand.

"Yes?" Amelia sighed.

"Umm, we were wonderin' why your boobies and bum are so pale." He said quickly, before looking a good bit embarrassed at having been the one to speak up.

Amelia blushed at the question, before sighing and realized that for most of the kids here, they might never have seen a tan line before, much less any clothing. "Well," she started, "I didn't always live here at Bareside. I lived in a different town where we have to wear clothes." So far so good, the kids all looked at each other in silence, trying to figure out why people would wear clothes all the time. "And whenever I went to the beach or the pool, I'd wear a swimsuit, and when I tanned, the parts of me under the swimsuits wouldn't tan, leaving these pale spots. They're called 'tan lines'." Amelia was glad that they'd disappear on their own in another week or two.

The kids all nodded, and thankfully with their curiosity sated, she could get them all back to the art lesson at hand. For now...

1411111221122112212211221122122111122112.content:
Amelia thought about it for a moment, "What does a home room teacher do?" She didn't want a new position that would be too inconvenient.

Mr. Peters answered calmly, "Nothing too bad, you're the first and last teacher these kids will see." He began counting off the responsibilities on his fingers, "You take their attendance in the morning, sometimes you'll have a mini-lesson to give them, like organizing their lockers or writing in cursive. Then you'll take them to their first class and you'll teach your classes until the end of the day, when they come back to you and you'll make sure they've got everything before escorting them to the buses."

Amelia nodded along, it did seem like a good position, with a pay raise too, and at least this group seemed to be well behaved. "Mr. Peters, I'll take it." She said reaching her hand out for a handshake.

Mr. Peters smiled and shook it, "Good. Their homeroom is F113, so head over and get yourself acquainted with your new office. They'll be seeing you again at the end of the day."

Amelia nodded and headed off, eventually finding the right hall and walking down it, the cartoonish decorations on the doors and walls taking her back to her own childhood. She did find F113 quickly though, and the room was a bit messy, having a bunch of 4th graders together will do that, but it was doable, and she had a very large desk now too. She sat down in the chair to get a feel for it, finding it extremely comfortable.

info.brief_description: This website has plenty of ENF, so why not?
info.description:
Greetings and all that, potential writers.
Inspired by a couple stories from CHYOA, this story will take the E out of ENF and replace it with a C. For confidence.

Basically, it’s the same as an ENF story in which a girl loses her clothes in a public place. However, instead of being embarrassed, the girl decides to roll with it and “own” her nudity.

Of course, how confident these girls actually are is up to you. Are they truly unashamed about being seen in the buff, or just faking it to save face?

Sound like fun yet?

Rules:
I shan’t allow underage sex, and I definitely shan’t allow rape or non-con.
Other than that, just try to keep things on topic.

EDIT 8/1/2020
The fanfiction section is a mess of endless choice chapters with no actual content right now, so I’m instating a new rule. Once you’ve selected a character, there should be no more than three choices before arriving at a story.
